page.title: 14CHANGING FACE OF FARMING
page.content: MECHANISATION HAS IN RECENT YEARS MADE FARMING A TOTALLY INTENCE OCCUPATION.WHERE THERE USED TO BE MANY FARM HANDS AND MUCH OF THE WORK WAS INDEED PHYSICAL NEW TYPES OF MACHINERY HAS MEANT THAT NOT AS MANY LABOURERS ARE NECESSARY. IRRIGATION HAS BEEN A MAJOR STEP FORWARD, WATER CAN IN DROUGHT CONDITIONS MEAN THAT THE YEILD CAN IMPROVE BY FOUR TIMES.IMPROVEMENTS TO FERTILIZERS AND INSECTICIDES MEANS THAT WERE CROP ROTATION WAS IN THE PAST A NECESSITY THERE IS NOW NOT A NEED FOR THE FALLOW YEAR.22500 GALLS OF WATER IS NOW PUMPED ONTO ROOT CROPS PER ACRE.YEILDS EXPECTED IN A GOOD YEAR ARE AS FOLLOWS WHEAT AND BARLEY 2 TONS TO THE ACRE,SUGAR BEET 15/16 TONS.POTATOES 15/16TONS PER ACRE.THRESHING OF THE CORN WAS DONE BY A HUGE STEAM ENGINE,COAL TO DRIVE THIS WAS LEFT IN THE SIDINGS.
